bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of yue shi 月蝕 , lunar eclipse, ulcers that persist for a long time without cure and eventually cause a child to gain a yellow complexion and be emaciated. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry hu 虎 quotes SXF : 月蝕疳瘡：虎頭骨二兩搗碎，豬脂一斤，熬 膏塗之 , “ Lunar eclipse gan -illness sores : grind 2 liang of tiger bones to pieces, and boil with 1 jin of lard to a paste to apply to it externally”.
